title: The Trojan Horse Affair - Part 7
description: Birmingham authorities struggle to explain why they disavowed their own findings about the Trojan Horse plot. But when Brian and Hamza make a discovery deep inside some court documents, everything suddenly makes sense.
author: rich@thislife.org (Serial Productions & The New York Times)
